history.proof: intros t v. induction t. - simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec n v); auto. + shelve. + shelve. - simpl. shelve.

In environment L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop f : Functions L t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) v : nat Unable to unify "fol.apply L f t" with "apply f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) t v (var v))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
lt_depth: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat), substituteTerm t v (var v) = t

Premises:
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type] ?B :
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Trying to mask the absolute name "apply"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
substituteTerm = fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else var v | @fol.apply _ f ts => apply f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm

Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
substituteFormula = fun (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) => proj1_sig (substituteFormulaHelp f v s) : fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L Arguments substituteFormula _ _%nat_scope
substituteFormulaHelp : forall f : fol.Formula L, nat -> fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}
substituteFormulaNot : forall f : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (notH f)}
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (q : lt_depth b (forallH v a)) (r : nat * fol.Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaForall v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall v a z2 q
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
substituteFormulaForall : forall (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth b (forallH n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (forallH n f)}
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t

```coq
intros t v. induction t.
- simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v0 v); auto.
- simpl. reflexivity.
Qed.```
